personal.name: Abdallah Eleyan
personal.title: Abdallah Eleyan
personal.subtitle: Software Engineer
personal.description: Software Engineering graduate working across full-stack and mobile development, always eager to learn and take on new challenges

projects.name: Portfolio Website
projects.longDescription: A modern portfolio website featuring stunning animations, interactive elements, and seamless user experience. Built with React and advanced CSS techniques.

projects.name: ZATCA E-Invoice Integration
projects.longDescription: A comprehensive ZATCA Phase 2 e-invoicing integration system for Saudi Arabia tax compliance. Features include XML invoice generation, QR code encoding, digital certificate signing, and sandbox/production API integration for both B2B and B2C invoices.

projects.name: Electronics repair services system
projects.longDescription: Comprehensive electronics repair management system featuring service tracking, customer management, inventory control, and repair status updates with real-time notifications.

projects.name: Grocery App
projects.longDescription: A modern grocery shopping application offering seamless product browsing, smart cart management, and secure checkout. Features include real-time inventory updates and personalized recommendations.
